mapper.select: SELECT DTLS_TYCD /*세부유형코드*/ , DTLS_TYNM /*세부유형명*/ FROM pms_cd_del_mng WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND GRP_TYCD = '0000000000' AND BKUP_ID = '0000000000'

SELECT A.EMPNO , A.PRJT_ID , A.EMPNM , A.EMAIL_ADDR , A.CPNO , A.BZCD , A.AUT_CD , A.LGN_PWD , A.REAL_PRJT_ID , A.DEPT_CD , CASE WHEN A.LGN_PWD != #{lgn_pwd} THEN 'N' WHEN A.LGN_PWD = #{empno} '211111' THEN 'C' ELSE 'Y' END AS LOGIN_YN FROM pms_emp_info A WHERE 1=1 AND A.EMPNO = #{empno} AND A.PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id} AND A.BKUP_ID = '0000000000'
AND A.LGN_PWD = #{lgn_pwd}
